messages.subject: Bed wetting when cold
messages.msgSnippet: hahahah thanks yes I remeber the idea that temp has something to do with bladder holding all night came up along the journey of bed wetting so that does make
messages.messageBody:
hahahah thanks yes I remeber the idea that temp has something to do
with bladder holding all night came up along the journey of bed
wetting so that does make sense.

We will be ready for what comes but for now I am holding onto my joy
of dry nights for summer and the hope that it is finally past us.

--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, jennefer harper
But, don't be suprised if you experience some wettness in fall
and/or winter. With the first signs of the change of season here, my
son has been having accidents. I think it's due to the colder
weather.

messages.subject: Re: past bed wetting issues...
messages.msgSnippet: ... But, don t be suprised if you experience some wettness in fall and/or winter.  With the first signs of the change of season here, my son has been having

But, don't be suprised if you experience some wettness
in fall and/or winter. With the first signs of the
change of season here, my son has been having
accidents. I think it's due to the colder weather.

-Jennefer
